about_the_game:
Honour the storied past of the Gingy's homeland with the Legends of Olympus Pack! Olympus is a land of myths and monsters, warriors and heroes, and some pretty good golfers too! This pack contains the following cosmetic items for your ball:

Gorgon
Minotaur
Corinthian Helmet
Winged Hat of Hermes
Olympian Wig
Trireme
Charon's Ferry
Zeus' Lightning
Souls Trail
Olympian Vase

Dress to impress with the brand new Legends of Olympus Pack. After thousands of years its safe to say these items will never go out of style, and all in a monstrously good selection.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mint 18 / Ubuntu 16.04.01
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 @3.1GHz or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 / Radeon 6870 / Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Golf With Your Friends - Legends of Olympus Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Golf With Your Friends - Legends of Olympus Pack - $3.99 $2.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Golf With Your Friends - Legends of Olympus Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) or Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 @3.1GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 / Radeon 6870 / Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 3.3GHz / AMD FX 8350 4.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 4GB VRAM / AMD R9 280 3GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Dress to impress with the brand new Legends of Olympus Pack. After thousands of years its safe to say these items will never go out of style, and all in a monstrously good selection.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
